site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:04am on
September 27, 2023.
While waiting on-site, the inspector made contact with the registrant by phone, stating no one was available for an
inspection today.
End Section
